page.title: 11Farming Around Rufforth 1985
page.content: There are 11 farms varying in size from 30 acres to 190 acres.Length of ownership varies from 3yrs to 35yrs. {6 farmers had made changes and are {still continuing to do}so.One had sold land for building 7 houses.Every farmer uses{fertilizers.}The land in our area is flat.It varies in quality from{poor to good.}Two farmers owned land on the{old airfield.}No restrictions have been placed on the farmers as the{R.A.F.}do not own it any longer.Runways can be removed but no farmers have broken up runways because it is a time consuming expensive procedure.The most {common {crops were wheat and barley.}Cattle and cows seemed to be very popular.Not many farmers grew rape.{Two farmers {grew hay and four grew potatoes.}Only one farmer kept horses which were for leisure purposes only.
